```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gov.1005.data)
raw <- read_csv("https://pollofpolls.eu/get/polls/IT-parliament/format/csv")
```

```{r}
raw %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y =LN)) + geom_point() 
```
  
  
Purpose of this document is to show polling resluts in Italy.
